cpuNum.description: Number of processors in the virtual machine.

cpuReady.description: Time that the virtual machine was ready, but could not get scheduled to run on the physical CPU. In millisecond

hostName.description: Name of the host hosting the virtual machine.

netTx.description: Rate at which data is transmitted. In KB/s

networks.description: List of the networks link to this virtual machine

powerState.description: Power state of the virtual machine.

readLatency.description: Amount of time for a read operation from the virtual disk. In millisecond

readRate.description: Rate of reading data from the virtual disk. In KB/s

roleFt.description: The index of the current VM in instanceUuids array starting from 1, so 1 means that it is the primary VM.

snapshotNum.description: Number of snapshot of the virtual machine.

stateFt.description: The fault tolerance state of the virtual machine.

vmwareTools.description: Current version status of VMware Tools in the guest operating system.

writeLatency.description: Amount of time for a write operation from the virtual disk. In millisecond

writePerSecond.description: Number of write issued per second to the virtual disk. In millisecond

writeRate.description: Rate of writing data from the virtual disk. In KB/s
